/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the rich history and culture of the city. Cars and trucks are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape.
